scripts.dev: dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.development -- bun next dev
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.production -- bun next build
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.production -- bun next start
scripts.test:run: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.test -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration/posts.test.ts && dotenvx run -f projects/.env.test -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration/server-actions.test.ts --no-coverage
scripts.test:coverage: bun run test:coverage:unit && bun run test:coverage:integration
scripts.test:coverage:unit: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.test -- vitest run --coverage src/__tests__/unit
scripts.test:integration:posts: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.test -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration/posts.test.ts
scripts.test:coverage:integration: bun run test:integration:payload-client && bun run test:integration:payload-filters && bun run test:integration:posts && bun run test:integration:server-actions && bun run test:integration:safe-action && bun run test:integration:collections-posts && bun run test:integration:collections-users && bun run test:integration:collections-media
scripts.test:e2e: bun run test:db:up && bun run test:migrate && echo 'ðŸš€ Starting Next.js server...' && dotenvx run -f projects/.env.test -- npx next dev --port 3001 > /tmp/next-dev.log 2>&1 & sleep 10 && echo 'ðŸ§ª Running Playwright tests...' && npx playwright test --timeout=30000; EXIT=$?; bun run test:db:down && pkill -f 'next dev'; exit $EXIT
scripts.test:e2e:headed: bun run test:db:up && bun run test:migrate && dotenvx run -f projects/.env.test -- npx next dev --port 3001 > /tmp/next-dev.log 2>&1 & sleep 10 && bunx playwright test --headed; EXIT=$?; bun run test:db:down && pkill -f 'next dev'; exit $EXIT
scripts.test:migrate: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.test -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --import tsx" PAYLOAD_CONFIG_PATH=src/payload.config.ts payload migrate
scripts.test:integration: bun run test:db:up && bun run test:migrate && bun run test:run; EXIT=$?; bun run test:db:down; exit $EXIT
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:deps && npm run analyze:duplication || true && npm run analyze:unused
scripts.env:encrypt: dotenvx encrypt -f projects/.env && dotenvx encrypt -f projects/.env.development && dotenvx encrypt -f projects/.env.production && dotenvx encrypt -f projects/.env.test
scripts.env:decrypt: dotenvx decrypt -f projects/.env && dotenvx decrypt -f projects/.env.development && dotenvx decrypt -f projects/.env.production && dotenvx decrypt -f projects/.env.test
scripts.env:rotate: dotenvx rotate -f projects/.env && dotenvx rotate -f projects/.env.development && dotenvx rotate -f projects/.env.production && dotenvx rotate -f projects/.env.test
scripts.env:genexample: dotenvx ext genexample -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env.production -o projects/.env.example
scripts.payload:migrate: NODE_ENV=production dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.production -- payload migrate
scripts.generate:types: dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.development -- cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --import tsx" PAYLOAD_CONFIG_PATH=src/payload.config.ts payload generate:types
scripts.generate:importmap: dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.development -- cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --import tsx" PAYLOAD_CONFIG_PATH=src/payload.config.ts payload generate:importmap
